gui.diet.title: Diet
groups.diet.grains.name: Grains
groups.diet.proteins.name: Proteins
groups.diet.fruits.name: Fruits
groups.diet.vegetables.name: Vegetables
groups.diet.sugars.name: Sugars
commands.diet.set.success: Value for group %s set to %s%% for %s
commands.diet.add.success: Value for group %s increased by %s%% for %s
commands.diet.subtract.success: Value for group %s decreased by %s%% for %s
commands.diet.export.finished: Finished exporting diet information to logs/diet.csv
gui.diet.config.buttonX.name: Button horizontal position
gui.diet.config.buttonX.description: The x-position of the Diet GUI button in player inventories.
gui.diet.config.buttonY.name: Button vertical position
gui.diet.config.buttonY.description: The y-position of the Diet GUI button in player inventories.
gui.diet.config.addButton.name: Button appears in inventory
gui.diet.config.addButton.description: If enabled, a button to the Diet GUI appears in player inventories.
gui.diet.config.textColor.name: Diet menu text color
gui.diet.config.textColor.description: The primary text color of the Diet GUI, as an integer or hexadecimal.
gui.diet.config.deathPenaltyMin.name: Minimum percent after death penalty
gui.diet.config.deathPenaltyMin.descript: The minimum percentage that diet groups can be reduced to upon death.
gui.diet.config.deathPenaltyLoss.name: Death penalty percent loss
gui.diet.config.deathPenaltyLoss.descrip: The reduction in percentage applied to all diet groups upon death.
gui.diet.config.deathPenaltyMethod.name: Death penalty method
gui.diet.config.deathPenaltyMethod.descr:
The method to apply for losses due to death penalties.
AMOUNT = Reduce by a flat percentage amount
PERCENT = Reduce by a percent of the current value
RESET = Reset value to defaults
gui.diet.config.gainPenaltyPerGroup.name: Gain penalty per food group
gui.diet.config.gainPenaltyPerGroup.desc: The percentage reduction in total gain for each diet group consumed at once.
gui.diet.config.decayPenaltyPerGroup.des: The percentage reduction in total decay for each diet group decayed at once.
gui.diet.config.foodOverrides.name: Food quality overrides
gui.diet.config.foodOverrides.descriptio:
Food quality overrides for diet gain values.
Format:"modid:name;quality"
gui.diet.config.generateGroupsForEmptyIt: Generate food groups for unclassified items
If enabled, food groups are assigned to unclassified items based on ingredients.
gui.diet.config.hideTooltipsUntilEaten.d: If enabled, food group tooltips are hidden until player has eaten that type of item.
